problems.title: Check Perfect Square
problems.description:
You are given a non-negative integer N. A perfect square is an integer that can be written as k^2 for some integer k.
Your task is to check whether N is a perfect square or not.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if N is a perfect square, otherwise print "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
16

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
20

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: Compute k = floor(sqrt(n)) using integer arithmetic and check if k*k == n or (k+1)*(k+1) == n.
